overview.about-body: This project was an exploration of information architecture. My goal was to assemble a dataset, look for trends or interesting insights and then visualize it in an understandable and engaging way

collecting.sub-heading: Tracking every aspectâ€¨of my driving for 3 weeks
collecting.body: Each day this semester I commuted 21 miles to and from campus each day and it was a source of much stress and frustration. I decided to track this activity to see if there was any way to improve the experience.
collecting.conclusion: I was able to use the sensors on an iphone to gather the data required to analyze my driving patterns.

trends.body: I used a variety of different graphing tools to look for trends in my data.
trends.conclusion: The most interesting insight was the immense amount of variation in commute duration based on my departure time

prototyping.body: From my wireframes I created high fidelity prototypes with limited interactivity. Since clear communication was essential to the success of this design, I wanted to test with proper visual hierarchy
